lines.text: This is not a wedding ceremony, Mr. Browning. You are not obligated to repeat everything I say.
Stop that animal! STOP THAT ANIMAL!
Stamps with animals? Yes, I believe we do... but you don't have to shout!
So Beckett's birthday was 6 months ago, or 6 months from now depending on how you look at it.

[takes a fish out of his mouth]
I used to be a pelican, what were you?
Excuse me, is Mr. Shackleton in?
I'm Mr. Shackleton. Mr. Browning thought it sounded more official to have two names on the door.
Having cough medicine, what're you doing here?
This isn't cough medicine, it's brandy.

[Browning's first words after returning to Earth as Benji the dog as he narrowly escapes getting hit by a garbage truck]
Oh, shit! That was close!
